nodes.text: Ghibli fruit was a type of fruit that was edible by Humans. Around 18 BBY, the Jedi Knight Jax Pavan and his droid companion I-5YQ provided a plate of the fruit to a young Human Force-sensitive named Kajin Savaros after Pavan brought Savaros to his Poloda Place apartment on the Galactic Empire's capital planet of Coruscant. Savaros ate the fruit while Pavan questioned him about his Force-sensitivity and his encounters with the Inquisitors, a group of Force-users who served the Galactic Empire.
Ghibli fruit first appeared in Coruscant Nights III: Patterns of Force, a 2009 novel written by Michael Reaves with help from Maya Kaathryn Bohnhoff.
